name: Dawn of the Tubers
description:
"Dawn Of The Tubers" is a simple masher Arcade game based on the "Roots" theme by GGJ 2023 where your objective is to save the highest number of tubers before the harvester end with their lives. The game works with 2-player same keyboard multiplayer.

A Arcade game made in one week for Global Game Jam 2023!

THE TEAM

Production and Game Design

  • Gabriel Carvalho

Characters arts and Animation

  • Koji Shintome
  • Isabella Soares Ruiz

2D Art and Background

  • Arthur Laranja
  • Helena Ene
  • Renato Gimbernau Gimenez
